editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: Prayer of Saint Peter, ጸሎተ፡ ጴጥሮስ፡ (f-60r); Asmat Prayer, “I Beseech You Lest I die Early,” ተማኅጸንኩ: ከመ: ኢይሙት: ዘእንበለ: ጊዜየ: (f-67v). Colophon on 67v mentions emperor Menilek and the year 7,309 (sic) = 1909 ? EC, in the Mark the Evangelist, Scribes' name Takla Tsion. Written in the city of Mihur Gidam. Praise of the Beloved in Honor of Our Lord, Sǝbḥatä Fǝqur, ስብሐተ፡ ፍቁር፡ አምላክነ: አምላክነ:, no Chaîne, Répertoire number (f-74r); Hymn to Mary, “I Praise Thy Grace,” እሴብሕ: ጸጋኪ: ኦእግዝእትየ: ማርያም: ዕፅ: ልምሉም:, No Chaîne, Répertoire number. (ff 74v-75v); Hymn to Mary, “I Praise Thy Grace,” እሴብህ: ጸጋኪ: Chaîne, Répertoire 344 (f-77v); Prayer of the Covenant, Ṣälotä Kidan, ጸሎተ፡ ኪዳን፡ (f-86v); Prayer to Mary, “Guard me,” ዕቀብኒ (87r-94r) mentioning the owner Walatta Giyorgis several times; Colophon 94r: "My Lady, I finished your wish; and may the Mother of God encourage you to fulfill my wish" ; Calendar: Lists of Holy days of Saints and Feasts.(f-95v).
